overview:
For more than 30 years, Mitchell Kurk, M.D., has served New York City and the surrounding areas with preventative and nutritional medicine. His goal is treating illnesses in a natural way. Offering: Chelation Therapy Intravenous Vitamin and Mineral Therapy Fungus and Bacteria-Killing Oxidative Therapy Nutritional Support of Cancer Patients Nutritional Support for Chronic Fatigue Syndrome DAN Protocol Regime for Autism, Attention Deficit Disorder, etc.

He also uses supplemental therapy for anti-aging, skin and hair treatments, and immune system boosting for men and women.
